name: Water2D
description: Simulation of Water.
author: TODO

name: Pseudo3D
description: Simulation of 3D.
author: Hei

name: Teleport
description: Make an object dissapear in a bright glow, like it is being teleported away. See the effect in action in the animation below.
author: pend00

parameters.name: TELEPORT_progress
parameters.description: progress of the disapear effect

parameters.name: TELEPORT_noise_desnity
parameters.description: Density of the generated noise?

parameters.name: TELEPORT_beam_size
parameters.description: noise beam size

parameters.name: TELEPORT_color
parameters.description: Color of the noise generated

name: Color Manipulator
description: This is a simple color manipulator, it support brightness, contrast, saturation, tint and more.
author: randomDam

name: Almost Invisible
description: Given a sprite, this shader gives it the ability to become invisible and fade into the background. But the ability is not flawless and the background is slightly deformed by the invisibility cloaking.
author: CasualGarageCoder
customCall: uv, screen_uv, TEXTURE, size, TEXTURE_PIXEL_SIZE, color, FRAGCOORD

parameters.name: ALMOSTINVISIBLE_alpha
parameters.description: alpha, ranging from 0 (no cloaked) to 1 (fully cloaked)

parameters.name: ALMOSTINVISIBLE_dist
parameters.description: dist, specifying the offset of the background in pixels

name: Border Noise
description: Border with gradient and Noise effect, seems like mana of your sprite. Some minor tweaks done to adapt.
author: 9exa

name: Chromatic Aberration
description: Chromatic Aberration effect. This shader only affect to the sprite.
author: chatgpt

parameters.name: CHROMATICABERRATION_red_displacement
parameters.description: Displacement of the red channel.

parameters.name: CHROMATICABERRATION_green_displacement
parameters.description: Displacement of the green channel.

parameters.name: CHROMATICABERRATION_blue_displacement
parameters.description: Displacement of the blue channel.

parameters.name: CHROMATICABERRATION_red_vertical
parameters.description: If the displacement of the channel is vertical or horizontal.

parameters.name: CHROMATICABERRATION_green_vertical
parameters.description: If the displacement of the channel is vertical or horizontal.

parameters.name: CHROMATICABERRATION_blue_vertical
parameters.description: If the displacement of the channel is vertical or horizontal.

parameters.name: CHROMATICABERRATION_scale
parameters.description: Scale to apply to the displacement. Use this to allow high separation of channels.

name: Circle Pixel
description: Pixelate the texture to circle pixels with curstom radius
author: jijiji

parameters.name: CIRCLEPIXEL_amount_x
parameters.description: Amount of pixels in the X axis.

parameters.name: CIRCLEPIXEL_amount_y
parameters.description: Amount of pixels in the Y axis.

name: Pixel Disolve
description: Disolve the texture by pixels, and custom resolution of pixels
author: cak3_lover

parameters.name: PIXELDISOLVE_time
parameters.description: To control the time to disolve the texture.

parameters.name: PIXELDISOLVE_custom_resolution
parameters.description: Resolution of pixels to disolve.

name: Shield
description: Shield Fx over the texture
author: Erich_L

parameters.name: SHIELD_ring_radius
parameters.description: Radius of the shield circle around the texture.

parameters.name: SHIELD_thickness_scalar
parameters.description: Thickness of the circle.

parameters.name: SHIELD_speed
parameters.description: speed of the effect during the time

parameters.name: SHIELD_main_color
parameters.description: main color of the shield. Shield goes from one color to other.

parameters.name: SHIELD_lerp_color
parameters.description: final color of the shield. Shield goes from one color to other.

name: Plasma Waves
description: Plasma Waves adapted to texture
author: kcfresh53 -> scarletshark

parameters.description: There are a lot! make fun.

name: Speed Lines
description: based on a speedlines shader by axilirate, this one is more psicodelic and like super saiyan power.
author: axilirate

parameters.name: SPEEDLINES_noise
parameters.description: noise applied to the shader

parameters.name: SPEEDLINES_line_color
parameters.description: line color for the speedlines.

parameters.name: SPEEDLINES_line_count
parameters.description: Number of lines

parameters.name: SPEEDLINES_line_density
parameters.description: Density of lines

parameters.name: SPEEDLINES_line_faloff
parameters.description: Fallof of lines over the time

parameters.name: SPEEDLINES_mask_size
parameters.description: Size of the masks

parameters.name: SPEEDLINES_animation_speed
parameters.description: speed of the animation

parameters.name: SPEEDLINES_flash
parameters.description: Whether to enable the flash with the texture or not

name: Circular Waves
description: Based on Circular Waves 2D around your texture (original author Erich_L), but modified a bit to produce more psicodelic results.
author: Erich_L

parameters.name: CIRCULARWAVES_amplitude
parameters.description: amplitude of the circle

parameters.name: CIRCULARWAVES_frequency
parameters.description: frequency of the circle.

parameters.name: CIRCULARWAVES_speed
parameters.description: Speed of the effect during the time

parameters.name: CIRCULARWAVES_waveDeformation
parameters.description: Deformation of the wave

parameters.name: CIRCULARWAVES_waveAmplitude
parameters.description: Amplitude of the Wave

parameters.name: CIRCULARWAVES_waveFrequency
parameters.description: Frequency of the Wave

parameters.name: CIRCULARWAVES_blendingAmount
parameters.description: Blending percent color of the waves

parameters.name: CIRCULARWAVES_waveColor1
parameters.description: Color1 of the Wave

parameters.name: CIRCULARWAVES_waveColor2
parameters.description: Color 2 of the Wave

parameters.name: CIRCULARWAVES_mode1, 2 and 3
parameters.description: Thre different modes operation of the shader. Experiment mixing modes.

name: Color Swap Hue
description: This shader will convert a color to another with a margin of tolerance while trying to account for the slights variations in hue and saturations artists use when adding shades/highlights.
author: Noidexe

parameters.name: COLORSWAPHUE_from
parameters.description: Color to be replace

parameters.name: COLORSWAPHUE_to
parameters.description: Color Replacement.

parameters.name: COLORSWAPHUE_tolerance
parameters.description: Tolerance from the color selected to be replaced

name: Line Art
description: simple line art effect, change threshold to modify detail.
author: Ayano

parameters.name: LINEART_threshold
parameters.description: threshold to define borders over the texture

parameters.name: LINEART_color
parameters.description: Color of the lineart.

parameters.name: LINEART_mix
parameters.description: Mix of the result color with the previous shader

name: RippleGradient
description: This is as simple ripple gradient shader. Similar to Rainbow.
author: Miisannn

parameters.name: RIPPLEGRADIENT_speed
parameters.description: speed of the efect during the time

parameters.name: RIPPLEGRADIENT_frequency
parameters.description: frequency of the sin waves.

parameters.name: RIPPLEGRADIENT_amplitude
parameters.description: Amplitude of the frequency waves

parameters.name: RIPPLEGRADIENT_pastelColors
parameters.description: Check to use pastel colors

parameters.name: RIPPLEGRADIENT_mix
parameters.description: Mix of the effect with previous shader

name: Hologram
description: Makes the sprites look like a hologram
author: Vaquers

parameters.name: HOLOGRAM_mix
parameters.description: mix color with previous shader

parameters.name: HOLOGRAM_lines
parameters.description: Number of lines produced by the effect.

parameters.name: HOLOGRAM_color1
parameters.description: First color band of the hologram

parameters.name: HOLOGRAM_color2
parameters.description: Second color band of the hologram

parameters.name: HOLOGRAM_speed
parameters.description: Speed of the effect

parameters.name: HOLOGRAM_alpha
parameters.description: Transparency percent of the effect

parameters.name: HOLOGRAM_noise_amount
parameters.description: Noise effect percent of the hologram

parameters.name: HOLOGRAM_effect_factor
parameters.description: Hologram effect amount

name: Wipe
description: Wipe an image horizontally or vertically using a custom alpha. Supports wiping sprites that have multiple frames.
author: Zibetnu

parameters.name: WIPE_percentage
parameters.description: wipe percentaje

parameters.name: WIPE_hidden_alpha
parameters.description: alpha of the hidden texture.

parameters.name: WIPE_flip
parameters.description: Whether to flip the wipe or not

parameters.name: WIPE_horizontal
parameters.description: Horizontal or Vertical wipe

parameters.name: WIPE_frames
parameters.description: Number of Frames of the effect

name: Color Swap
description: 8 Color ColorSwap that shows grayscaled strips on unswapped colors.
author: nullMolotov

parameters.name: COLORSWAP_mix
parameters.description: Mix percent of the shader color with previous one

parameters.name: COLORSWAP_max_colors
parameters.description: Max number of colors to evaluate. Set this value to the max number of color the shader must evaluate to optimize the shader

parameters.name: COLORSWAP_show_stripes
parameters.description: Whether to show stripes with colors not replaced

parameters.name: COLORSWAP_tolerance
parameters.description: tolerance with colors to be matched

parameters.name: COLORSWAP_input_colorX
parameters.description: This is a sample of any color number. color x to search. This color will be replaced

parameters.name: COLORSWAP_output_colorX
parameters.description: This is a sample of any color number. Color X to replace with

name: Pulse
description: With this shader you can apply a pulse effect.
author: alberto

parameters.name: PULSE_shine_color
parameters.description: Shine color to apply to the Texture

parameters.name: PULSE_alpha_limit
parameters.description: Only apply the shine if the pixel alpha color is equals or greater than this value. (Usefull if you won’t to apply the shine to shadows for example)

parameters.name: PULSE_cycle_speed
parameters.description: The speed of the pulse to apply the shine

parameters.name: PULSE_full_pulse_cycle
parameters.description: If true, the pulse is continuosly, otherwise, it makes a pause in each cycle

name: Matrix
description: Some kind of matrix effect, but if you replace the noise, you can find cool effects
author: duongvituan

parameters.name: MATRIX_direction
parameters.description: Direction of the effect, top - down, down-top

parameters.name: MATRIX_velocity
parameters.description: Velocity of the effect

parameters.name: MATRIX_ROW
parameters.description: Number of rows of the texture to subdivide

parameters.name: MATRIX_value
parameters.description: value transition in time to control the effect

parameters.name: MATRIX_chars_tex
parameters.description: Texture to apply to the effect. Fun with this.

parameters.name: MATRIX_number_row_char_texture
parameters.description: number of rows of the char texture to subdivide

parameters.name: MATRIX_number_column_char_texture
parameters.description: number of columns of the char texture to subdivide

parameters.name: MATRIX_tint_color
parameters.description: tint color of the effect

parameters.name: MATRIX_line_thickness
parameters.description: thickness of eache column/row?

name: Holowave
description: Holographic Wave effect.
author: duongvituan

parameters.name: HOLOGRAPHIC_noiseTex
parameters.description: Noise Texture used to perform the holographic shader

parameters.name: HOLOGRAPHIC_value
parameters.description: holographic transition during the time

parameters.name: HOLOGRAPHIC_speed
parameters.description: speed of the automatic transition during the time. Se 0 to position manually with value

parameters.name: HOLOGRAPHIC_mix
parameters.description: mix percent with color of the previous shader

name: Holographic
description: Holographic effect.
author: duongvituan

parameters.name: HOLOGRAPHIC_noiseTex
parameters.description: Noise Texture used to perform the holographic shader

parameters.name: HOLOGRAPHIC_value
parameters.description: holographic transition during the time

parameters.name: HOLOGRAPHIC_speed
parameters.description: speed of the automatic transition during the time. Se 0 to position manually with value

parameters.name: HOLOGRAPHIC_mix
parameters.description: mix percent with color of the previous shader

name: CorssFade Circle
description: Cross Fade of the texture using a circle to fade out or fade in.
author: Rpics Studio

parameters.name: CROSSFADE_CIRCLE_transparency
parameters.description: transparency of the circle which is the base of the fade

parameters.name: CROSSFADE_CIRCLE_position
parameters.description: position of the circle over the transparency.

parameters.name: CROSSFADE_CIRCLE_dissolveColor
parameters.description: Disoolve color to perform the transition fade

parameters.name: CROSSFADE_CIRCLE_circleSize
parameters.description: size of the circle to perform the fade transition

name: Disolve Burn
description: Burn effect disolving the texture.
author: duongvituan

parameters.name: DISOLVEBURN_noise_tex
parameters.description: Noise texture to apply during the disolve effect

parameters.name: DISOLVEBURN_burn_color
parameters.description: Color to apply during the burn effect.

parameters.name: DISOLVEBURN_mix
parameters.description: mixing color percent of the effect

name: Shadow
description: Add a 2D shadow behind your texture. IMPORTANT: This shader should be the last one in position to be effective.
author: deakcor

parameters.name: SHADOW_deform
parameters.description: deformation of the shadow

parameters.name: SHADOW_offset
parameters.description: distance of the shadow to the sprite.

parameters.name: SHADOW_modulate
parameters.description: modulation of the shadow to make perspective effect

name: Burn
description: The shader apply a burn effect over the texture.
author: duongvituan

parameters.name: BURN_offset
parameters.description: position of the effect over the texture

parameters.name: BURN_speed
parameters.description: speed of the fx during the time.

parameters.name: BURN_burnValue
parameters.description: mix of the color with the previous shader. 0->No Mix, 1->full mix

name: Gold
description: The shader apply a gold effects over the texture.
author: duongvituan

parameters.name: GOLD_offset
parameters.description: position of the effect over the texture

parameters.name: GOLD_speed
parameters.description: speed of the fx during the time. This affect to the brights changes over the time.

parameters.name: GOLD_mix
parameters.description: mix of the color with the previous shader. 0->No Mix, 1->full mix

name: Freeze
description: The shader apply a freeze effects over the texture.
author: duongvituan

parameters.name: FREEZE_offset
parameters.description: position of the effect over the texture

parameters.name: FREEZE_speed
parameters.description: speed of the fx during the time. This affect to the brights changes over the time.

parameters.name: FREEZE_mix
parameters.description: mix of the color with the previous shader. 0->No Mix, 1->full mix

name: Metal
description: The shader apply a metal effects over the texture.
author: duongvituan

parameters.name: METAL_offset
parameters.description: position of the effect over the texture

parameters.name: METAL_speed
parameters.description: speed of the fx during the time. This affect to the brights changes over the time.

parameters.name: METAL_mix
parameters.description: mix of the color with the previous shader.

name: Shiny
description: This shader adds a shine effect to the texture.
author: duongvituan

parameters.name: SHINY_processValue
parameters.description: position of the bright over the texture

parameters.name: SHINY_size
parameters.description: size of the bright band

parameters.name: SHINY_smoothLight
parameters.description: smooth of the bright at the borders, concentrating light more or less

parameters.name: SHINY_intensity
parameters.description: Intensity of the bright

parameters.name: SHINY_angle
parameters.description: Angle of the bright over the sprite

name: Empty Outline
description: Outline wihtout content
author: duongvituan

parameters.name: EMPTYOUTLINE_lineColor
parameters.description: Color of the outline

parameters.name: EMPTYOUTLINE_lineThickness
parameters.description: thicknes of the outline

name: Outline
description: Outline effect
author: duongvituan

parameters.name: OUTLINE_thickness
parameters.description: Thickness of the outline border, in pixels

parameters.name: OUTLINE_color
parameters.description: Color of the outline

name: Blur
description: Blur effect
author: chatgpt

parameters.name: BLUR_radius
parameters.description: Radius of pixels to consider the blur effect

parameters.name: BLUR_mix
parameters.description: Percent of mixing color with the previous Shader. 0->No Mix, 1->full mix

name: Glitch
description: Glitch effect
author: duongvituan

parameters.name: GLITCH_offset
parameters.description: Distance of the particles

parameters.name: GLITCH_speed
parameters.description: speed at which the effect runs

parameters.name: GLITCH_size
parameters.description: Size of the effect particles

parameters.name: GLITCH_amount
parameters.description: Amount of effect particles

parameters.name: GLITCH_mix
parameters.description: Color Mix Percent with the previous Shader.. 0->No Mix, 1->full mix

name: Greyscale
description: Replace colors with a grayscale. Posibility to set the tone.
author: chatgpt

parameters.name: GREYSCALE_tintColor
parameters.description: Color to apply to the fx.

parameters.name: GREYSCALE_Luminosity
parameters.description: Luminosity of the effect.

parameters.name: GREYSCALE_Blend
parameters.description: Blend color percent with the tint color.

name: Rainbow
description: Fx to change color tone during the time.
author: chatgpt

parameters.name: RAINBOW_speed
parameters.description: Speed of the change color effect.

parameters.name: RAINBOW_redFactor
parameters.description: Red factor to apply to the color effect during transitions.

parameters.name: RAINBOW_greenFactor
parameters.description: Green factor to apply to the color effect during transitions.

parameters.name: RAINBOW_blueFactor
parameters.description: Blue factor to apply to the color effect during transitions.
